alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 26 at 7:02AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, are slick and hazardous. Plan on difficult travel conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect accumulating snow to end by early this afternoon.
info.instruction: For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
